title: The Basic Components
summary: The basic components are the container, the layout, the header, and the footer.  We start with these components.

blocks.content:
The basic components are the container, the layout, the header, and the footer.

The container component is so simple and useful. I use the container component in the layout,  the header, the footer, and pages for fitting the dimensions of the content. Max-width values are 720px or 960px for these components. I use the [conditional (ternary) operator ](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Operators/Conditional_Operator)for different values.
The layout component is the main structure of pages. it includes the header component, children structure, and the footer component.

The Header component must include the logo component and the menu component. these components are in the container component. The logo component includes a logo image and the image is scalable. The menu component includes menu items and links for every page.
